schema_definition.title: Invoice Line Items Extractor
schema_definition.description: This schema is used to extract line items from an invoice, which includes the description of the item, quantity purchased, unit price, and the total price for the item.

item_description.description: A detailed description of the item purchased.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item purchased. This is a positive integer.

unit_price.description: The price for a single unit of the item. This is a numeric value that can have two decimal places.

total_price.description: The total price for the item taking quantity into account. This is calculated as the quantity multiplied by the unit price and can have two decimal places.
